ability.Storm Drain: This Pokemon draws Water moves to itself to raise Sp. Atk by 1; Water immunity.

Earth Power.effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.

Pain Split.effect: Shares the combined HP of the user and target equally.

Protect.effect: The user is protected from attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn. Fails if the user uses this move last turn.

Ice Beam.effect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
